EventTimeReferenceCodeType.title: Event time reference code
EventTimeReferenceCodeType.description:
Code specifying a time that references an event that
will or has occurred.

oneOf.title: Date of confirmation of order received
Date proceeds of resale collected by buyer
Date goods received by buyer's agent
Date goods handed over for shipment by seller or agent
Date of delivery of goods to establishments/domicile/site
Stipulated date for payment of documentary credit
Stipulated date for acceptance of documentary credit
Stipulated date for negotiation of documentary credit
Date of delivery to buyer of documents representing goods
Date of delivery to buyer's agent of documents representing goods
Date of delivery to carrier of documents representing goods
Date of delivery to intermediary bank of documents representing good
Date of bill of lading, consignment note or other transport document
Date of receipt for loading (mate's receipt)
Date of negotiable instrument (draft, promissory note, bank)
Date of receipt of tool dependent initial samples plus unlimited absolute bank guarantee plus value added tax
Date of presentation of negotiable instrument
Date of acceptance of negotiable instrument
Date of acceptance of first samples produced under production conditions
Date of provisional reception of work
Date of final acceptance of work
Date of certificate of preliminary acceptance
Date of certificate of final acceptance
Date of issue of transport document(s)
Draft(s) at ... days after date of issuance of transport document(s)
Draft(s) at ... days after date of presentation of documents
Date of shipment as evidenced by the transport document(s)
Other reference date agreed upon between the parties
